apple.name: apple
apple.description: A big juicy apple, heals for 2HP

apricot.name: apricot
apricot.description: A small sweet fruit, heals for 1HP

banana.name: banana
banana.description: Pirates find this delicious, heals for 2HP

cherry.name: cherry
cherry.description: Commonly found in pairs, heals for 1HP

orange.name: orange
orange.description: It has a color named after it, heals for 3HP

lemon.name: lemon
lemon.description: A sour fruit, mostly used to make lemonade, heals for 1HP

coconut.name: coconut
coconut.description: A tropical fruit with a tough shell, heals for 3HP

durian.name: durian
durian.description: Some find this good, most find it gross, heals for 2HP

mango.name: mango
mango.description: Goes well in a smoothie, heals for 2HP

lychee.name: lychee
lychee.description: A delicious fruit with a spikey shell, also the name of a cs teacher, heals for 1HP

pear.name: pear
pear.description: A common fruit with small seeds, heals for 2HP

Plum.name: plum
Plum.description: A sweet fruit with a hard pit, heals for 2HP

copperOre.name: copperOre
copperOre.description: A soft metal with a reddish-orange color

tinOre.name: tinOre
tinOre.description: An ore commonly used to make bronze
